name: Gangster Crime - Street Fight
description:
Come on, gangster master, it’s your chance to prove that your gang is the most powerful in the neighborhood! Defeat all your enemies in the face-to-face battles playing our new Gangster Crime - Street Fight game! Check your ultimate fighting skills, perform awesome combat stances, combo strikes, exciting blows and do everything possible to become the best gang fighter ever!

Gangster Crime - Street Fight features:
• Interesting fighting opportunities
• Great street gang battles
• Stunning combo strikes and blows
• Exciting martial arts to perform
• Many unlockable characters to play for
• Nice yakuza fight 3D atmosphere
• Three awesome game modes

Download this amazing Gangster Crime - Street Fight game and become a real martial arts master – kung fu, taekwondo, wrestling, jiu-jitsu, judo and even simple boxing are waiting for you!
